alert.note: Alert for Independence; Jackson; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:10PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Independence, southwestern Jackson and north central White Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 209 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oil Trough, or 13 miles southeast of Batesville, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark... Pleasant Plains... Oil Trough... Magness... Southside in Independence Count... Salado... Olyphant... Thida... Rosie... Heffington... Huff... Possum Grape... Hutchinson... Denmark... Sunnydale... Roosevelt... This includes US Highway 67 between mile markers 68 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
